important_dates.content: Stay ahead by marking your calendars with these crucial deadlines for the upcoming CGS 2026. Timely registration and submissions will ensure you make the most of this premier event.

Explore_Our_Comprehensive_Networking_Ser.content: Unlock new opportunities and build valuable connections with our comprehensive networking services, tailored to enhance your conference experience.
Explore_Our_Comprehensive_Networking_Ser.headding: Unleash Your Growth: Benefits of Participating in Conferences

Be_A_Volunteer.content: Join CGS 2026 as a volunteer and experience the conference from the inside. Assist in sessions, support speakers and delegates, and engage with leading oncology experts while contributing to an event that fosters innovation, collaboration, and breakthroughs in cancer treatment.

Submit_Your_Abstract.content: We invite researchers and healthcare professionals to submit abstract for oral or poster presentations. Share your latest work in cancer biology, diagnostics, therapeutics, or patient care, and join the global effort to advance oncology and improve lives.

sessions.content: CGS 2026 covers a wide range of topics in oncology and cancer therapeutics, including tumor biology, immuno-oncology, genomics, early detection, precision medicine, novel drug delivery, AI in oncology, and more. Sessions are designed to inspire collaboration, spark innovation, and highlight breakthroughs in both research and clinical practice.

footer_content.content: Welcome to the Global Oncology & Cancer Therapeutics Conference 2026, uniting researchers, clinicians, and industry leaders to share innovations in cancer biology, diagnostics, therapeutics, and patient care for advancing global oncology.

12.headding: From Discovery to Cure: Advancing Oncology Globally
12.tag_line: Oncology & Cancer Therapeutics-CGS July 23-24, 2026 in Czech Republic
12.content: Discover the full details of CGS 2026, including the schedule, keynote speakers, sessions, and delegate information. The brochure is your guide to planning participation, exploring cutting-edge research, and connecting with global oncology experts.
